solution_line_template: The sports channels cost ${movie_channels_cost} - ${sports_channels_cost_reduction} = $<<{movie_channels_cost}-{sports_channels_cost_reduction}={sports_channels_cost}>>{sports_channels_cost} per month.

Jessica has to pay ${basic_cable_cost} + ${movie_channels_cost} + ${sports_channels_cost} = $<<{basic_cable_cost}+{movie_channels_cost}+{sports_channels_cost}={total_monthly_payment}>>{total_monthly_payment} in total per month.
